text: mariyu tirpu jarigina taruvata saitanu (varito) antadu: "Niscayanga, allah miku cesina vagdaname satyamaina vagdanam. Mariyu nenu miku vagdanam cesi danini bhangam cesanu. Mariyu naku mipai elanti adhikaram undedi kadu; nenu kevalam mim'malni ahvanincanu, miru svikarincaru. Kavuna miru nannu nindincakandi mim'malni mire nindincukondi. Nenu miku sahayam ceyalenu mariyu miru naku sahayam ceyaleru. Intaku mundu miru nannu (allah ku) satiga kalpincina danni niscayanga nenu tiraskaristunnanu. Niscayanga, durmargulaku badhakaramaina siksa untundi
